statements: UPDATE DiseaseOutbreaks SET total_cases = 1000, recovery_rate = 0.75 WHERE outbreak_id = 1;
UPDATE DiseaseOutbreaks SET affected_region = 'Europe', total_cases = 5000 WHERE disease_name = 'Influenza';
UPDATE DiseaseOutbreaks SET total_cases = total_cases + 100 WHERE outbreak_id = 5;
UPDATE DiseaseOutbreaks SET recovery_rate = 0.75, total_cases = 500 WHERE disease_name = 'Covid-19' AND affected_region = 'Europe';
UPDATE DiseaseOutbreaks SET response_efforts = 'Quarantine initiated' WHERE outbreak_id = 1;
UPDATE Regions SET region_population = 1500000, region_name = 'Central Region' WHERE region_id = 3;
UPDATE DiseaseOutbreaks SET outbreak_name = 'Influenza' WHERE outbreak_id = 1
UPDATE Regions SET region_population = 100000, region_coordinates = ST_GeomFromText('POINT(-122.334540 47.609730)') WHERE region_id = 3
UPDATE disease_outbreaks SET number_of_cases = 50 WHERE outbreak_id = 1;
UPDATE response_efforts SET response_description = 'Initiated emergency medical supplies distribution' WHERE response_id = 3;
UPDATE disease_outbreaks SET number_of_cases = 1000, region_name = 'North Region' WHERE outbreak_id = 1;

UPDATE outbreaks SET region='Asia' WHERE outbreak_id=1;
